function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for lightweight buildings and structural systems","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of contagious diseases due to smaller communal spaces and individual units","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and promoting hygiene practices within the built environment","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, and touchless fixtures","People":"Occupants of lightweight buildings and structures","Owner":"Architects, construction companies, and building owners"},{"Description":"Adaptive methods leading to less compact working environments and more individual allocated spaces","Impact":"Potential decrease in social distancing within workplaces, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict social distancing protocols, providing clear guidelines for workspace layouts, and promoting remote work options","Technologies":"Digital workspace management tools, sensors for monitoring occupancy, and video conferencing solutions","People":"Employees and employers","Owner":"Employers and workplace management"}]}
